We all went on a trip to Mexico and got really wasted.
translation.fr: On était au Mexique, on était torchés et on a été dans une vieille église.

translation.en: We found this old church, and we decided to party in it,
translation.fr: on était torchés et on a été dans une vieille église.

translation.en: and my roommate wanted to play truth or dare, so we did.
translation.fr: On a joué à Action ou vérité, mais à notre retour,

translation.en: But when we got home, the game, it just kept going.
translation.fr: On a joué à Action ou vérité, mais à notre retour, le jeu a continué, ma coloc est morte...

translation.en: My roommate died first, and then the other ones and--
translation.fr: le jeu a continué, ma coloc est morte...

translation.en: How is this possible?
I wish I knew. I thought this was some kind of karmic payback for Sam trashing the place, you know?
translation.fr: Je sais pas, c'est peut-être le karma, à cause des conneries de Sam.

translation.en: Uh, yeah, Sam. He was one of my friends.
translation.fr: Oui, Sam, un de mes amis, il était bourré, il a cassé des trucs.

translation.en: He got really drunk, and he just started breaking stuff.
translation.fr: un de mes amis, il était bourré, il a cassé des trucs.

translation.en: I don't know. We were all being idiots. I don't...
translation.fr: On était tous à la masse.

translation.en: Our friend just had a turn in the game. It wouldn't let her pick truth. Do you know why?
translation.fr: Notre copine a pas pu choisir vérité. Tu sais pourquoi ?

translation.en: It's how we played. We called it "two truths and a dare."
translation.fr: On a joué comme ça : deux vérités, une action.

translation.en: If two people pick truth in a row, then the next person had to do a dare.
translation.fr: Après deux vérités de suite, il fallait une action.

translation.en: Thought it was more fun that way.
More fun?
Your asshole buddy gave us a death sentence.
Any more super dangerous rules you wanna tell us about? Easy, Pen.
translation.fr: - T'en as d'autres, des comme ça ? - Du calme.

translation.en: He told me he was dared to find a new group to play.
translation.fr: Son défi, c'était de jouer avec d'autres gens dans l'église.

translation.en: And that it had to be at the mission. He didn't have a choice, you know?
translation.fr: Son défi, c'était de jouer avec d'autres gens dans l'église. Il avait pas le choix.

translation.en: Of course he did.
Okay, so where is Carter now?
I haven't talked to him since he went back to Mexico.
I thought that when he got a new group to play, that we would be out.
translation.fr: Je pensais qu'avec vous, on sortirait du jeu.

translation.en: I can't believe he only got five of you to play. If he would've gotten more,
translation.fr: Si vous aviez été plus nombreux,

translation.en: then I would've had a longer time before I had to go again.
translation.fr: j'aurais eu plus de temps avant de rejouer.

translation.en: You got another turn?
Okay. It's time to go, guys.
Is this why you're telling us the truth?
translation.fr: Tu nous dis la vérité pour ça ?

translation.en: No. I, uh... I picked dare.
Markie's right. Let's get out of here.
Okay, we're leaving. Come on, Olivia.
I am so sorry, Olivia.
How did you know my name when I got here? I didn't put it in the message.
translation.fr: Comment tu connais mon nom ? J'ai pas signé le message.

translation.en: -Hold her down! -I have to kill Olivia!
translation.fr: - Tiens-la ! - Faut que je tue Olivia !

translation.en: [Lucas] Stop moving.
What was she thinking?
It wasn't her.
Something took over like she was possessed.
She didn't finish her dare.
translation.fr: Elle a pas fait son action.

translation.en: Like Ronnie. This is what happens.
So what do we do?
We tell the truth.
[Olivia] She was erratic, said she had to kill me.
translation.fr: Elle a dit qu'elle devait me tuer.

translation.en: Then Penelope pushed me out of the way. She shot her and then turned the gun on herself.
translation.fr: Penelope s'est interposée, Giselle l'a tuée et s'est suicidée.

translation.en: Were you aware that Giselle Hammond was wanted for murder? Yes.
translation.fr: Vous saviez qu'elle était recherchée pour meurtre ?

translation.en: Yeah, we thought that she knew someone that we were looking for.
translation.fr: Elle connaissait un garçon qu'on cherchait, rencontré au Mexique, Carter.

translation.en: A guy that we met in Mexico, his name was Carter.
translation.fr: un garçon qu'on cherchait, rencontré au Mexique, Carter.

translation.en: You don't know his last name?
Any of these people look like him?
translation.fr: Est-il sur l'une de ces photos ?

translation.en: No, who are they?
Five of Giselle Hammond's friends. All deceased.
translation.fr: Cinq amis de Giselle Hammond, tous décédés.

translation.en: Three suicides, two accidental deaths. All in three weeks.
translation.fr: Trois suicides, deux morts accidentelles, en trois semaines.

translation.en: And now you've lost two friends.
translation.fr: Et c'est au tour de vos amis.

translation.en: I don't believe in coincidences, Olivia.
translation.fr: Je ne crois pas aux coïncidences.

translation.en: I think this is all connected. If you know how, you need to tell me.
translation.fr: Ces affaires sont liées. Si vous savez comment, dites-le.

translation.en: No, I promise.
If I did know, I would.
translation.fr: si je savais, je vous le dirais.

translation.en: I hope so.
We'll be in touch.
Don't take any more vacations.
That did not go well. [Lucas] We told them the truth.
translation.fr: - Ça s'est mal passé. - On a dit la vérité.

translation.en: -As much as we could. -Guys,
the cops should be the least of our concerns.
translation.fr: On s'en fout, de la police.

translation.en: I mean, Penelope's dead, and Giselle gave us nothing.
translation.fr: Penelope est morte et Giselle nous a rien appris.

translation.en: She did say a new game had to start at the mission.
translation.fr: Si, le jeu doit commencer à l'église.

translation.en: That place has to be the key.
[sighs] Catch up with you guys later.
No, we shouldn't split up. No, it's okay. My turn's not for a while.
translation.fr: - On se sépare pas. - Mon tour est dans longtemps.

translation.en: I'll deal with my father. You deal with finding the mission.
translation.fr: Je m'occupe de mon père, essayez de retrouver l'église.

translation.en: Come on.
I think it was built in 1896.
Yeah, that really narrows it down.
It's a start.
Oh, shit. I gotta grab my charger.
I think you left your bag in my room.
translation.fr: Ton sac est dans ma chambre.

translation.en: Check this out.
It says there was a massacre a few weeks later.
translation.fr: LE CORPS DU PRÊTRE RETROUVÉ DANS LE COUVENT DE ROSARITO Il y a eu un massacre peu après.

translation.en: "Only one survivor lives in the area. Inez Reyes, 19."
translation.fr: "Seule survivante, Inez Reyes, 19 ans, vit dans la région."

translation.en: [in distorted voice] Truth or dare.
Where is she? Liv!
Hey! Hey!
Where am I? -Where am I? -What the hell are you...
Are you okay?
Was that your turn?
[Lucas] Hey! Hey! Come back! Come back!
Olivia, what did he say?
He dared me to sleep with Lucas.
Why would you pick dare?
Because of what Giselle said.
translation.fr: À cause de ce qu'a dit Giselle.

translation.en: If I picked truth,
I was just forcing someone else to pick dare.
translation.fr: j'aurais obligé le suivant à prendre action.

translation.en: How noble.
Markie, I didn't know that's what it would ask.
translation.fr: Je savais pas qu'il demanderait ça.

translation.en: I don't think he knew where he was.
translation.fr: Il savait pas où il était.

translation.en: -Are you guys okay? -Yeah, I'm perfect.
Well, hey, hey! Where are you going?
Anywhere but here.
What is going on?
Why don't you ask Olivia?
Will you please tell me what the hell is going on?
translation.fr: Tu peux m'expliquer ce qui se passe ?

translation.en: I got my turn.
Yeah, and?
Whoa. Hey, no. What are we doing?
Oh, this is the dare.
I'm sorry.
Why didn't you pick truth?
I told Markie it was so that you guys wouldn't have to,
translation.fr: J'ai dit à Markie que c'était pour vous,

translation.en: but that was a lie.
I chose dare because there is something that I can never tell Markie, and I'm really afraid the game's gonna make me do it.
translation.fr: Je cache quelque chose à Markie et j'ai peur d'être obligée de lui dire.

translation.en: It can't be that bad.
translation.fr: Ça peut pas être si terrible.

translation.en: You have no idea.
No, you're just doing this because of the dare. Because you have to.
translation.fr: Tu le fais parce que c'est l'action, t'es obligé.

translation.en: No, you have to.
I don't.
[in distorted voice] Look at me.
Truth or dare?
Truth or dare?
[choking] Truth!
Who are you truly in love with?
I care about you. I do.
I'm in love with Markie.
Liv, I'm sorry. It was the game.
No, it was the truth.
[Markie on video] Roy Cameron, 45 years old, attempts to make dinner.
translation.fr: Roy Cameron, 45 ans, tente de faire à manger.

translation.en: Take one.
Whoa. A little faith, please?
Nobody makes a steak like your old man.
translation.fr: Ton vieux est le roi du steak.

translation.en: [Markie] Wait. Dad, I'm pescatarian now.
translation.fr: Papa, je ne mange plus de viande.

translation.en: I know, honey.
Dad?
I miss you so much.
I miss you, too.
There's something that I've been dying to ask you.
translation.fr: Je meurs d'envie de te poser une question.

translation.en: -She's not answering. -[Lucas] Wait.
Come here. Look at this.
There's no number, but she lives in Tijuana. That's less than three hours away.
translation.fr: Elle vit à Tijuana, à moins de trois heures d'ici.

translation.en: Who is she?
She's someone who might be able to help us.
translation.fr: Une femme qui pourrait nous aider.

translation.en: Come on.
[Roy in distorted voice] Come on, sweetheart.
Time to pick.
Truth.
The gun I used to kill myself,
translation.fr: Le pistolet avec lequel je me suis tué...

translation.en: why do you keep it?
Sometimes, I think about using it.
translation.fr: Parfois, je pense à m'en servir.

translation.en: Maybe you should get it.
[Lucas] I'm worried about Markie.
I wish we would have found her before we left.
translation.fr: On sait pas où elle est.

translation.en: Well, she doesn't want to speak to me right now, so there's nothing we can do.
translation.fr: Elle veut pas me parler, on y peut rien.

translation.en: You know that secret that you're keeping from her?
translation.fr: Si tu lui disais ton secret,

translation.en: Maybe if you got it out, the game couldn't use it against you.
translation.fr: le jeu pourrait pas s'en servir contre toi.

translation.en: No, no one can ever know.
Especially not Markie. It would kill her.
translation.fr: Surtout pas Markie, ça la tuerait.

translation.en: I'll try her again when we get there.
-Um... -[in English] Can I help you?
Sorry. Um, we're looking for Inez Reyes.
She's my grandmother. I watch after her.
translation.fr: C'est ma grand-mère, je m'occupe d'elle.

translation.en: We were just wondering if we could speak to her.
She speaks to no one.
No, please.
Our friends are dying, just like hers did. We just need a few words.
translation.fr: Nos amis meurent, comme les siens. Juste quelques mots.

translation.en: I will ask.
And if you could show her this.
translation.fr: Et si tu pouvais lui montrer ça.

translation.en: Show her that we were at this mission
translation.fr: On a été dans cette église,

translation.en: and that half the people in this photo are now dead.
translation.fr: et la moitié de ces personnes sont mortes.

translation.en: Then maybe she'll talk to us.
She might see you. But she will not speak to you.
translation.fr: Même si elle vous reçoit, elle ne vous parlera pas.

translation.en: She has not said a word in 50 years.
translation.fr: Elle n'a pas dit un mot depuis 50 ans.

translation.en: Wait here.
She must have taken a vow of silence, right?
translation.fr: Elle a dû faire vœu de silence.

translation.en: She was 19 when her friends were butchered. Imagine what that did to her.
translation.fr: Elle avait 19 ans au moment du massacre, imagine.

translation.en: I don't have to.
It's been over an hour.
Yeah, for someone who doesn't speak, they seem to be doing a lot of talking.
translation.fr: Pour quelqu'un qui parle pas, ça discute beaucoup.

translation.en: She will see you.
I'm sorry for the wait.
She has written something for you.
What is it?
[girl] She would not let me read it.
translation.fr: Elle ne veut pas que je lise.

translation.en: [in English] Thank you for seeing us, Ms. Reyes.
translation.fr: Merci de nous recevoir, Mme Reyes.

translation.en: "The mission was a convent where young women went to find God.
translation.fr: "Le couvent accueillait des jeunes filles pieuses.

translation.en: We were girls, so we played silly games like hide-and-seek.
translation.fr: Nous étions jeunes, nous jouions parfois à cache-cache.

translation.en: But the priest who ran the convent forced us to play his own game.
translation.fr: Mais le prêtre du couvent nous imposait ses règles :

translation.en: He let us hide, but then he took the one he found.
translation.fr: nous nous cachions et il retenait celle qu'il trouvait.

translation.en: His pleasure was our pain.
We suffered in silence.
Then one of the girls told a secret.
She knew spells that could call spirits,
translation.fr: nous révèle qu'elle savait appeler les esprits.

translation.en: so she summoned a demon named Calux.
translation.fr: Alors, elle a invoqué un démon appelé Calux.

translation.en: He possessed our game."
Possessed the game?
"Demons possess people, places,
translation.fr: "Les démons possèdent les gens, les lieux,

translation.en: objects, even ideas."
translation.fr: les objets et même les pensées."

translation.en: "Calux is a trickster.
That night, when the priest found his victim, she was possessed by Calux.
translation.fr: Cette nuit-là, la victime du prêtre était possédée par ce démon.

translation.en: She hid the priest's body in the mission
translation.fr: Elle a caché le corps du prêtre,

translation.en: in pieces.
It took them a week to find his head.
translation.fr: On a retrouvé sa tête une semaine plus tard.

translation.en: But Calux didn't want to stop. He made us keep playing.
translation.fr: Calux nous a obligées à continuer le jeu.

translation.en: Many of my sisters died."
translation.fr: Beaucoup de mes amies sont mortes."

translation.en: Wait. How did you and the others escape?
"The person who released the demon
translation.fr: "La personne qui a libéré le démon

translation.en: can trap it with a simple ritual. But only by his own hand."
translation.fr: peut l'enfermer par un rituel qu'elle seule peut réaliser."

translation.en: Uh... This is the spell? It's in Spanish.
translation.fr: C'est l'incantation ? Elle est en espagnol.

translation.en: "The spell must be repeated seven times,
and a sacrifice must be placed in a pot sealed with wax.
translation.fr: et le sacrifice doit être mis dans un pot scellé.

translation.en: As long as the pot stays sealed in the mission,
translation.fr: Tant que ce pot reste dans l'église, la porte que l'on a ouverte à Calux

translation.en: the door we opened for Calux will also be sealed."
translation.fr: Tant que ce pot reste dans l'église, la porte que l'on a ouverte à Calux restera scellée."

translation.en: Wait. I've seen that pot before.
translation.fr: J'ai déjà vu un pot comme ça.

translation.en: Look. When I saw it, it was broken,
and there was something inside it, and it smelled rotten.
translation.fr: et dedans, ça sentait la pourriture.

translation.en: "Whoever broke the pot will have to do the same."
translation.fr: "Qui a brisé le pot devra faire de même."

translation.en: What was it? The sacrifice?
It was you who summoned the demon?
translation.fr: C'est vous qui avez invoqué le démon ?

translation.en: It's been a few years since AP Spanish, but I think it says,
translation.fr: Mon espagnol est poussiéreux, mais je crois que ça dit :

translation.en: "I have called upon an evil.
Silence my voice so the evil is no more."
translation.fr: Que ma voix se taise pour que le démon disparaisse."

translation.en: So when Carter and his friends broke the pot at the mission--
translation.fr: Quand ils ont cassé le pot...

translation.en: The demon was freed and possessed their game of truth or dare.
translation.fr: Le démon a été libéré et il a possédé leur jeu.

translation.en: And we have to find whoever broke that pot.
translation.fr: Il faut trouver qui l'a cassé.

translation.en: Giselle said somebody named Sam trashed the place.
translation.fr: Giselle a parlé d'un certain Sam.

translation.en: Yeah, and we have no idea who Sam is. Or if he's even still alive.
translation.fr: - On sait pas qui c'est. - Ni s'il est en vie.

translation.en: And if we do find him...
What? "Hi, Sam, do you mind cutting out your tongue
translation.fr: "Salut, Sam, tu te couperais la langue

translation.en: and sealing it in this lovely handmade pot?"
translation.fr: pour la mettre dans ce ravissant pot artisanal ?"

translation.en: I'll check Giselle's Facebook again, see if there's a Sam tagged.
translation.fr: Je regarde s'il est sur le Facebook de Giselle.

translation.en: Still nothing from Markie?
She's ignoring all my texts.
translation.fr: Elle répond pas à mes textos.

translation.en: Her turn is next. I'm gonna try calling her again.
translation.fr: Ça va être son tour, je l'appelle.

translation.en: -Brad! It's your father. -[sighs]
Since Penelope, he's been...
I'll get rid of him.
Let's talk outside.
[Officer] I'm gonna grab a coffee.
translation.fr: Je vais me chercher un café.

translation.en: Look, uh, I'm hearing some things about your friend's murder.
translation.fr: J'entends des choses sur la mort de ton amie.

translation.en: Kranis in homicide isn't convinced it's so simple.
translation.fr: Kranis, de la Criminelle, a des doutes.

translation.en: I know I don't need to ask this, but...
Is there something you're not telling us?
No, I promise. Everything we told you was true.
translation.fr: Non, je t'assure, on a dit la vérité.

translation.en: Markie, thank God!
Why are you telling me all this?
'Cause I know Kranis is wrong, and I want you to know what's going on.
translation.fr: Je sais que Kranis se trompe, mais je voulais te tenir au courant.

translation.en: Look, you don't have to worry.
I'm not gonna let anything happen to you.
You're still my son, Brad.
You gonna get that?
Get what?
[voice on radio] Truth or dare, Brad?
[Markie] Yeah, I guess I just needed some time alone.
No, no, no. It's fine. Just get here as fast as you can. And please be careful.
translation.fr: Pas de souci, mais viens vite et fais attention.

translation.en: Your turn's next. I had my turn.
translation.fr: - T'es la prochaine. - Je suis passée.

translation.en: I chose truth. So did Lucas.
And if the both of you picked truth...
translation.fr: Si vous avez tous les deux pris vérité...

translation.en: [voice] You only have one choice.
You sure there's nothing you didn't tell me?
translation.fr: Tu es sûr que tu m'as tout dit ?

translation.en: I dare you to steal his gun
and make him beg for his life.
translation.fr: et le faire supplier de l'épargner.

translation.en: Son?
Thank you, Dad,
for everything.
There's just one more thing I need to do, and I hope you can forgive me.
translation.fr: J'espère que tu me pardonneras ce que je vais faire.

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, yeah. Of course.
For what?
It's okay.
I need you to beg.
translation.fr: Tu dois me supplier de t'épargner.

translation.en: -For your life. -The hell are you doing?
translation.fr: Tu dois me supplier de t'épargner. Quoi ?

translation.en: -Just do as I say... -You don't have to do this. ...or I'll die. Get on your knees.
translation.fr: Fais-le ou je meurs. À genoux !

translation.en: We have to go. Now!
Do as I say. I'll explain everything, okay?
-I know I've been hard on you. I'm sorry. -Listen. No!
That's not what this is about.
Beg! Please, I'll explain everything. Just beg.
I guess you think I deserve this.
Just beg!
Please! Just beg, and I'll put down the gun.
-What's that gonna prove, Brad? -Just beg!
And I'll put down the gun!
Get a paramedic.
Stay here. You're gonna be fine.
translation.fr: Reste avec moi, ça va aller.

translation.en: I need a paramedic. Help!
[Markie] I'm so sorry.
Guys, can we get out of here?
I still need to talk to the detective.
-I shouldn't have picked truth. -[Lucas] No.
It's not your fault. I picked truth, too.
translation.fr: T'y peux rien, j'ai choisi ça aussi.

translation.en: We shouldn't have left Brad alone. No, it wouldn't have mattered.
translation.fr: - On aurait dû rester avec Brad. - Ça aurait rien changé.

translation.en: This game is smart. It's too smart. We're not playing it.
translation.fr: Le jeu est trop fort, c'est lui qui dicte les règles.

translation.en: It's playing us. And none of this is a coincidence.
translation.fr: c'est lui qui dicte les règles. Et il attend qu'on soit vulnérable pour nous poser la question.

translation.en: It waits for our most vulnerable moments, and that's when it asks us.
translation.fr: Et il attend qu'on soit vulnérable pour nous poser la question.

translation.en: [in distorted voice] Yeah, you got that right, Olivia.
And now it's your turn.
Truth or dare?
What?
What is it?
Lucas just asked me.
[in normal voice] No, I didn't.
[in distorted voice] Truth or dare, Olivia?
Okay, you have to pick truth.
Olivia, do it. -Dare. -[Markie] Olivia.
I dare you
to tell Markie the secret you fear most.
translation.fr: de dire à Markie ton terrible secret.

translation.en: What? What is it making you do?
Markie, there's something important I need to tell you.
translation.fr: Il faut que je te parle.

translation.en: I was there the night your dad died. I know what happened.
translation.fr: J'étais là, le soir où ton père est mort.

translation.en: What?
What are you talking about?
I had gotten into a fight with my parents, so I went to your house.
translation.fr: Je m'étais disputée avec mes parents, alors je suis allée chez toi.

translation.en: You weren't there, so your dad let me in.
translation.fr: T'étais pas là, mais ton père m'a fait entrer.

translation.en: He was drinking, and he offered me one, so I took it.
translation.fr: Il était en train de boire et il m'a servie.

translation.en: We had a few, and then he told me that he had been fired that day
translation.fr: Après quelques verres, il m'a dit qu'il avait été viré

translation.en: 'cause he was drinking on the job.
And I just... I felt really bad for him. [sniffles]
translation.fr: il m'a fait de la peine.

translation.en: But I told him that you and I would help him figure things out.
translation.fr: Je lui ai dit que toi et moi, on l'aiderait à s'en sortir.

translation.en: And then he called me beautiful.
I was drunk, and I didn't know what to do, and then he leaned in to kiss me...
translation.fr: J'étais soûle, paniquée, il a voulu m'embrasser,

translation.en: I tried to push him off. I didn't do it, but he...
[sniffles] He kept coming back stronger.
translation.fr: Mais il revenait à la charge.

translation.en: Finally, I got free.
He begged me to forgive him,
translation.fr: Il m'a suppliée de le pardonner,

translation.en: said that he needed help, but I was so scared, and I was confused.
translation.fr: il a dit qu'il avait besoin d'aide, mais j'étais trop mal.

translation.en: And I threatened to tell you what happened, but he said that he would die if you ever found out.
translation.fr: J'ai menacé de tout te dire, et il a dit qu'il en mourrait.

translation.en: I told him that you'd be better off if he were dead.
translation.fr: Je lui ai répondu que tu t'en porterais mieux.

translation.en: Markie, I am so sorry.
I wanted to tell you, but by the time I got a hold of you,
translation.fr: Je voulais te le dire, mais j'ai pas eu le temps,

translation.en: he had already done it, and you were devastated.
translation.fr: il s'est tué et ça t'a brisée.

translation.en: It broke my heart. I didn't know what to do. Trust me. I--
translation.fr: J'étais effondrée, je savais pas quoi faire, crois-moi.

translation.en: No, I'll never trust you again.
translation.fr: Non, je peux plus te croire.

translation.en: Don't!
[Kranis] Miss Barron,
you're up.
[Kranis] "I know the game dared you to set that woman on fire.
translation.fr: "Je sais que le jeu t'a obligée à brûler cette femme.

translation.en: Tell me where to meet you, or I'll wait outside your family's house
translation.fr: Dis-moi où on peut se voir, ou j'attends devant chez toi

translation.en: until the game dares me to do the same to them."
translation.fr: que le jeu m'oblige à faire pareil à ta famille."

translation.en: That is quite a threat.
translation.fr: C'est ce qu'on appelle une menace.

translation.en: We traced the IP to your laptop.
translation.fr: On est remontés à votre ordinateur.

translation.en: [stammers] I know that that looks bad,
translation.fr: Je sais, ça fait pas bonne impression, mais c'était pour l'attirer.

translation.en: but I just needed to get her attention.
translation.fr: ça fait pas bonne impression, mais c'était pour l'attirer.

translation.en: Yeah, I know you're playing some kind of truth or dare game, but what I don't understand is, why are people dying?
translation.fr: Quand on joue à Action ou vérité, normalement, il n'y a pas de morts.

translation.en: There's only four of you left.
I'd like to keep the rest of you guys alive.
translation.fr: j'aimerais que vous restiez en vie.

translation.en: Four?
Everyone who's dead was in Mexico.
translation.fr: Vous avez tous été au Mexique.

translation.en: That leaves you, Markie and Lucas, and Giselle's friend, Sam Meehan.
translation.fr: Il reste vous, Markie, Lucas et l'ami de Giselle, Sam Meehan.

translation.en: Sam?
Wait. He's alive?
You know him?
No. [stammering]
That's just someone that Giselle had mentioned.
translation.fr: mais Giselle a parlé de lui.

translation.en: He's holed up in an apartment. Won't talk to anybody.
translation.fr: Il se terre chez lui et ne parle à personne.

translation.en: Said I had to arrest him if I wanted to speak to him again.
translation.fr: Il dit qu'il faut l'arrêter si on veut l'interroger.

translation.en: Olivia, what the hell is happening here?
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce qui se passe, à la fin ?

translation.en: Could I get some water, please?
translation.fr: Je peux avoir un verre d'eau ?

translation.en: Thanks.
Am I being charged?
translation.fr: Je suis en garde à vue ?

translation.en: Not yet.
Okay. Then I need to go.
translation.fr: Bien, alors il faut que j'y aille.

translation.en: Carter is Sam.
He was using a fake name.
But Giselle acted like they were different people?
Well, she was probably trying to protect him, but she slipped up, and she used his real name. Come on.
translation.fr: Elle le protégeait, mais son vrai nom lui a échappé.

translation.en: Markie, please open the door. We need to talk.
What are you doing?
What my father did.
Markie, please put it down.
[sobs] Why?
I don't have anything.
You have me.
-No, the game has us. -[cocks gun]
translation.fr: C'est le jeu qui nous a.

translation.en: I hid the truth about your dad to protect you.
translation.fr: Je t'ai caché la vérité pour te protéger.

translation.en: But I was wrong.
Every single day, I wish I could take back what I said to him.
translation.fr: Chaque jour, je regrette de lui avoir dit ça.

translation.en: He tried before.
It's not your fault.
We can't change the past.
But we can still have a future. We can end this game.
translation.fr: mais on a un avenir si on arrête ce jeu.

translation.en: How?
Carter. I know where he is.
Okay, so what's the plan?
We just have to get him back to the mission.
translation.fr: Il faut le ramener à l'église.

translation.en: Okay, so don't open with, "We need you to cut out your own tongue"?
translation.fr: Attends avant de lui dire de se couper la langue.

translation.en: Here it is. Six.
[Carter] Go away! I don't wanna talk to anyone.
Screw this.
-You... -[Olivia] Carter!
Or is it Sam?
-How did you find me? -We were motivated.
translation.fr: - Vous m'avez retrouvé ? - On est motivés.

translation.en: -What the hell happened in here? -The game.
translation.fr: - Il s'est passé quoi, ici ? - Le jeu.

translation.en: No contact with the outside. Nothing in here can hurt me.
translation.fr: Aucun contact avec l'extérieur, je suis à l'abri.

translation.en: This is your plan?
My plan is to wait it out.
No, that was your second plan.
Your first plan was to screw us.
translation.fr: Ton plan A, c'était de nous piéger.

translation.en: Three of my best friends are dead because of you!
translation.fr: J'ai perdu trois amis à cause de toi !

translation.en: I'm sorry. I lost friends, too, okay?
translation.fr: Je suis désolé, j'ai perdu des amis aussi.

translation.en: If I could take it all back, I would. There is a way.
translation.fr: - Je regrette. - On peut s'en sortir.

translation.en: But we all have to go back to the mission.
translation.fr: Mais il faut retourner à l'église.

translation.en: A way to what? To what, end the game? How?
Just trust me. We have to go back.
translation.fr: Fais-moi confiance, on doit y retourner.

translation.en: No, this is another dare, right?
The game is daring you to lure me out. -Is that-- -No.
translation.fr: Le défi, c'est de me faire sortir.

translation.en: She's telling the truth.
And why should I trust you?
Because we want the same thing.
translation.fr: Parce qu'on veut la même chose,

translation.en: We wanna survive.
I'm gonna tell you what you should have told me at the bar.
translation.fr: Je vais te dire ce que t'aurais dû me dire :

translation.en: Piss off.
Okay, sweet, little Olivia's not shooting anyone.
Try me. I dare you.
translation.fr: Tu paries ? Je te mets au défi.

translation.en: Is this ritual that old nun told you about actually gonna work?
translation.fr: Vous croyez à cette histoire de rituel ?

translation.en: [Olivia] There's only one way to find out.
So we're gonna end this with a seance? [Olivia] We are not ending it.
translation.fr: - On l'arrête en parlant aux esprits ? - Pas nous.

translation.en: You are.
Me?
I tried.
[chuckles] We all know how that turned out.
-Stay down. -[coughs]
Here, take this. Take it.
Say it seven times.
What are you gonna do with that?
I'm giving it to you.
Take it now!
Now say the words seven times.
Go!
[Olivia] Don't stop.
-Just tell me what's going on! -Keep going!
Say it again.
Five more times.
[in distorted voice] Truth or dare, Lucas?
Dare.
-Where are you going? -Just gotta get away from here.
translation.fr: - Tu vas où ? - Faut que je parte.

translation.en: Wait, wait, wait!
You can't go. Your turn's next.
translation.fr: T'en va pas, ça va être ton tour.

translation.en: I just had my turn.
-Gotta get away from you both. -Why?
Because it dared me to choose.
You already have. You love Markie!
Choose which one of you to kill.
Don't stop. Two more times.
translation.fr: - Il se barre ? - Encore deux fois !

translation.en: Why did you pick dare?
Because I knew if I didn't, then one of you would have to.
translation.fr: Pour vous éviter de le faire.

translation.en: And we're so close.
And I won't let the game kill you.
translation.fr: Je veux pas que le jeu te tue.

translation.en: You're such an idiot.
What can I say?
You do that to me.
translation.fr: c'est l'effet que tu me fais.

translation.en: That's seven. We gotta get out of here. This place is coming down.
No, there's one more thing to do.
Pick up the knife.
I can't do it for you.
translation.fr: Je peux pas le faire à ta place.

translation.en: Pick it up!
And do what?
I'm so sorry, Sam.
But you unleashed this evil,
which means you're the only one who can stop it.
translation.fr: T'as libéré ce démon, t'es le seul à pouvoir l'arrêter.

translation.en: I need you to cut out your tongue.
translation.fr: Tu dois te couper la langue.

translation.en: No! That's insane.
Please! It's the only way we survive.
translation.fr: C'est la seule façon de survivre !

translation.en: You take care of each other.
[Olivia] Do it.
Lucas, stop! That's not Lucas.
Do it now, Carter!
-[rumbling] -Before it's too late.
Don't you wanna live?
You do not have a choice! Do it!
I can't believe I'm about to do this.
translation.fr: Je peux pas croire que je vais faire ça.

translation.en: [in distorted voice] I will murder everyone you've ever known.
translation.fr: Je tuerai tous ceux que vous connaissez !

translation.en: No! They are not in this. It's just us!
You're right. But Lucas is. And he didn't do his dare.
translation.fr: C'est vrai, mais Lucas n'a pas fait son action.

translation.en: So now he dies.
Lucas refused his dare to save us.
translation.fr: Lucas s'est sacrifié pour nous sauver.

translation.en: We have to finish this.
[Markie] Calux killed Carter. The spell won't work.
translation.fr: Calux a tué Carter, le rituel ne marchera pas.

translation.en: No, we lost the second we started this game.
The second we came here.
Carter was dared to bring us here because this is where you can add new people to the game.
translation.fr: C'est ici qu'on fait entrer les nouveaux joueurs.

translation.en: I have an idea.
Your turn's next. When you're asked, I need you to pick dare.
translation.fr: Ça va être ton tour, prends action.

translation.en: Why would I do that?
Truth or dare?
[sobbing] Now Lucas is asking me.
Pick dare.
What? I'll die!
translation.fr: - Mais la fais pas. - Je vais mourir.

translation.en: I am so sorry for keeping that secret from you for so long.
translation.fr: Je suis désolée d'avoir gardé ce secret,

translation.en: And I swear to you I will never ever keep anything from you again.
translation.fr: et je te jure que je te cacherai plus rien,

translation.en: But we survive this only if we trust each other.
translation.fr: mais on survivra que si on se fait confiance.

translation.en: Trust me.
[Lucas] You have to pick.
Dare.
I dare you to shoot Olivia.
translation.fr: Je te défie de tirer sur Olivia.

translation.en: He wants me to shoot you.
translation.fr: Il veut que je te tire dessus.

translation.en: You gotta trust me, Markie. Don't do it.
This is the only way to save us both.
translation.fr: C'est le seul moyen de s'en sortir.

translation.en: I trust you.
I won't do it.
Dare complete, Calux.
Your turn.
Truth or dare?
[in distorted voice] I'm not in this game. No, once you're asked, you're in.
translation.fr: - Je ne joue pas. - T'es coincé.

translation.en: Those are the rules, right?
So truth or dare, asshole?
Truth.
How do we get out of this game alive?
translation.fr: Comment on survit à ce jeu ?

translation.en: You can't.
Carter was the only one who could stop this.
translation.fr: Carter était le seul à pouvoir l'arrêter.

translation.en: So now the game won't end until all the players are dead.
translation.fr: Le jeu continuera jusqu'à la mort de tous les joueurs.

translation.en: And your turn's next.
translation.fr: Et ça va être ton tour.

translation.en: Unless you find some new friends to play with.
translation.fr: Sauf si tu trouves de nouveaux camarades de jeu.

translation.en: But that's not gonna happen, is it?
translation.fr: Mais ça n'arrivera pas, n'est-ce pas ?

translation.en: [in normal voice] Your arm. I'm okay.
Well, did it work?
It's not over.
The game will never end, not as long as we're alive.
translation.fr: Le jeu continuera tant qu'on est en vie.

translation.en: What are you doing?
I'm choosing you.
[Olivia on video] My friends and I went on a trip to Mexico for spring break.
translation.fr: Avec des amis, on était au Mexique pour le Spring Break.

translation.en: We ended up in an old mission where we played a game of truth or dare.
translation.fr: Dans une vieille église, on a joué à Action ou vérité.

translation.en: We had no idea that we had encountered an unspeakable evil
translation.fr: On savait pas qu'on serait à la merci d'un démon

translation.en: that wanted to play with us.
When we went home, the game kept going.
translation.fr: À notre retour, le jeu a continué.

translation.en: It killed five of my friends.
translation.fr: Il a tué cinq de mes amis.

translation.en: The game is real.
Tell the truth, do the dare, or you die.
translation.fr: Dis la vérité, fais l'action, ou tu meurs.

translation.en: Refuse to play, you die.
It can happen anywhere. And it can come from anyone.
translation.fr: Ça peut arriver n'importe où, par n'importe qui.

translation.en: I'm so sorry, but I have to ask you.
translation.fr: Je suis désolée, mais je dois te poser la question :

translation.en: Truth or dare?
